# minimumTLSVersion

**Instance Property**

The minimum TLS version to allow for EAP-TLS authentication.

## Declaration

```swift
var minimumTLSVersion: NEVPNIKEv2TLSVersion { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNIKEv2TLSVersion/versionDefault].

## Accessing TLS version properties

- **maximumTLSVersion**: The minimum TLS version to allow for EAP-TLS authentication.
- **NEVPNIKEv2TLSVersion**: An enumeration of TLS Versions for use in EAP-TLS.
